attributes.action: Pay Rise For Nursing staff and care workers in the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
They deserve a pay rise for their hard work! Their dedication To help everyone they have to look after! 
Boris claps every Thursday at 8pm and to now completely ignore all the hard work they do with not giving them a pay rise is absolutely ridiculous!! 
Also to make them pay for parking too again at the end of the month is again ridiculous!!
attributes.background: The government who clapped for the NHS staff on a Thursday praising their hard work and saying how grateful we are for their hard work!! They deserve a pay rise! They put their lives and their families lives at risk for people they have to look after!!
